name: Plant Game (StormCat)
description:
As a member of the Cloak and Dagger Research Initiative, you have been hired to explore and scan the local flora of the newly discovered tropical Kokua Island.

Using a handy SeedGun to create living platforms at will, jump across the various challenges and scan the plants you find.

This is currently a PROTOTYPE, and will most likely be updated significantly in the future.

Made for iamwrongdog for the Secret Santa Jam 2021
